text:
If the group is specified as:

Group #-1

the resultant group is 4294967295 instead of -1.

There is a signed/unsigned mismatch.
creator: minfrin@sharp.fm

text:
Given the discussion on dev@, I'm not sure why you are reporting this as a bug.

It is expected behaviour.  It is designed to return a number for an unprivleged
group.  It is not an accidental overflow.
creator: slive@apache.org
